A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm really not sure what to think.  

A lot of it wasn't great.  A lot was fantastic.  A lot was really lazy - and even more was great for the fan-boy in me.

I can see why they're giving Rian Johnson more room to play.  But I'm kind of more excited about what Abrams is going to do in 9.

This might be the beginning of the end for Star Wars\, unfortunately.
